data.title: The Cure announce December 2022 UK & Ireland arena tour
data.meta_description: The Cure have announced a seven-date UK & Ireland arena tour for December 2022.
data.text:
They play seven shows as part of a huge European tour

The Cure have announced a seven-date UK & Ireland arena tour for December 2022.

The music legends will play an extensive run of shows throughout Europe next October and November before the UK & Ireland leg kicks off at Dublin 3Arena on Thursday 1st December.

The tour then visits Belfast SSE Arena, Glasgow OVO Hydro, Leeds First Direct Arena, Birmingham Utilita Arena and Cardiff Motorpoint Arena before concluding at London The SSE Arena on Sunday 10th December.

The Cure UK tour tickets:

Tickets to The Cure’s shows in Scotland, Wales and England go on sale from Absolute Radio Tickets at 10am on Friday 10th December 2021.

The Cure’s last studio album ‘4:13 Dream’ was released way back in 2008, however the band have spoken about fresh material in multiple interviews.

Reflecting upon the pressures of making a new album, keyboardist Roger O’Donnell told Classic Pop magazine: “Four years ago, I said to Robert (Smith), ‘We have to make one more record. It has to be the most intense, saddest, most dramatic and most emotional record we’ve ever made, and then we can just walk away from it.’

“He agreed. Listening to the demos, it is that record. I think everybody will be happy with it.”

O’Donnell continued: “The problem is, it’s 12 years since the last album so it becomes precious. When you’ve got a back catalogue like The Cure, it’s a lot to live up to. Robert has said, ‘if The Cure say any more, it had better be important and it had better be f---ing good’.

“It is, it’s going to be an amazing record. I just suggest a little patience.”

In August 2021, bassist Simon Gallup announced he was leaving The Cure after becoming “fed up of betrayal.”

Gallup wrote at the time: “With a slightly heavy heart I am no longer a member of The Cure! Good luck to them all...”

Two months later, Gallup confirmed he’s still a member of the legendary band.

The Cure’s UK tour dates:

DECEMBER 2022

Dublin 3Arena – Thu 1st

Belfast SSE Hydro – Fri 2nd

Glasgow OVO Hydro – Sun 4th

Leeds First Direct Arena – Tue 6th

Birmingham Utilita Arena – Wed 7th

Cardiff Motorpoint Arena – Thu 8th

London SSE Arena Wembley – Sun 11th
